page.title: 16Housing
page.content: The houses round where I live are all private houses with garages and gardens back and front.There are three types of houses on our road, link detached, dormer bungalows and semi detached bungalows. Some houses are made of brick, others brick with wood boarding, and some have pebble-dashed walls. The houses have either two or three bedrooms , bathrooms and toilets upstairs. Downstairs there is a kitchen, a dining room, a lounge and in some houses there is a cloakroom and toilet. The older houses in the area all have chimneys but our house was built in 1975 and as the area was a smokeless zone no chimneys were built on the modern houses. The houses are usually heated by gas (from the North Sea) or electricity and the majority have central heating.
